item.title: ISO: Data Scientist/Programmer
item.description: UPDATED: This position is now filled We’re looking for a Data Scientist to make Epiviz better, stronger and faster! This is a full-time position (officially Faculty Research Assistant) within the Center for Bioinformatics and Computational Biology (CBCB) at the University of Maryland in College Park. You will work along faculty in CBCB and the Human-Computer Interaction Lab in developing state-of-the-art genomic data visual analytics software tools. ##What you will do:
